Title: Db4o Extensions
Description: Db4o Extensions is a .NET library to ease database routines like creating composite keys, defining deletion behavior, data validation and transparent persistance.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Db4o Extensions is a .NET library to ease database routines like creating composite keys, defining deletion behavior, data validation and transparent persistance.

Key Features
  • composite keys for a class (including alternative composite keys)
  • auto configuration for Unique attribute usage
  • handling .NET data annotations for data validation
  • deferred deletion support with different deletion behavior defined via attributes (Cascade, Set Null, Restrict)
  • object consistency checking
